articles.title: Scientists Just Found a Significant Volume of Water Hidden Inside Mars - India.com
articles.description: The discovery was made by the Trace Gas Orbiter, a mission in its first stage under the guidance of the ESA- the European Space Agency (ESA)-Roscosmos project dubbed ExoMars.
articles.content: New Delhi: Scientists have discovered a ‘significant amount’ of water hiding under the surface of Mars, inside the Red Planet’s Valles Marineris, its version of our grand canyon system. Up to 40% of … [+2476 chars]

articles.title: Could GDPR policy erase your games? It happened to an Ubisoft customer - PCWorld
